Bobby Clement bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa ugbu a na-agbara Otu Rivers Jikọrọ Ọnụ nke Otu Ọkachamara bọọlu Naijiria
Ọ laghachiri klọb ochie ya mgbe ya na Al-Arabi SC kewara ụzọ
Bobby Clement malitere ọrụ ntorobịa ya na Shooting Stars
N'afọ 2014, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na Heartland FC,   ọ gbaara ha otu oge tupu ọ  kwaga Enugu Rangers
N'ubochi 8 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2017, Clement banyere klọb Kuwaiti Al-Arabi SC
